spells.name: Litany of Madness
spells.description: A single target is confused for at least 1 round.

spells.name: Litany of Thunder
spells.description: A single target is deafened until the condition is removed, and is confused for 1 round.

spells.name: Litany of Vengeance
spells.description: Allies attacking the target of the spell gain a +5 bonus on damage rolls for 1 round.

spells.name: Magic Siege Engine, Greater
spells.description: Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls for every four caster levels.

spells.name: Nondetection, Communal
spells.description: As nondetection, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
